author: mmahut
title: Open Data Public Notary
description: Governments around the world produce a lot of data, but it is problematic to ensure their integrity in time.
solution: Denotarious.io is a solution of storing proof-of-existence timestamps, that can be used by the citizens and its government, on Cardano.
experience: We are a team of OG Cardano developers and data journalists, please read our proposal for more information including a community FAQ.
